queries.sql: SELECT ref_modul_akses_label FROM ref_modul_akses WHERE ref_modul_akses_group_id IN ( SELECT ref_user_akses_group_id FROM ref_user_akses WHERE ref_user_akses_user_id = 1) and lower(ref_modul_akses_label) = 'admin/rekap'
select ref_pasar_id as id, ref_pasar_label as label from ref_pasar

SELECT ref_modul_akses_label FROM ref_modul_akses WHERE ref_modul_akses_group_id IN ( SELECT ref_user_akses_group_id FROM ref_user_akses WHERE ref_user_akses_user_id = 1) and lower(ref_modul_akses_label) = 'admin/survey'

SELECT ref_modul_akses_label FROM ref_modul_akses WHERE ref_modul_akses_group_id IN ( SELECT ref_user_akses_group_id FROM ref_user_akses WHERE ref_user_akses_user_id = 1) and lower(ref_modul_akses_label) = 'admin/notifikasi'

SELECT ref_modul_akses_label FROM ref_modul_akses WHERE ref_modul_akses_group_id IN ( SELECT ref_user_akses_group_id FROM ref_user_akses WHERE ref_user_akses_user_id = 1) and lower(ref_modul_akses_label) = 'admin/validasi'

SELECT ref_modul_akses_label FROM ref_modul_akses WHERE ref_modul_akses_group_id IN ( SELECT ref_user_akses_group_id FROM ref_user_akses WHERE ref_user_akses_user_id = 1) and lower(ref_modul_akses_label) = 'admin/rekap'

SELECT ref_modul_akses_label FROM ref_modul_akses WHERE ref_modul_akses_group_id IN ( SELECT ref_user_akses_group_id FROM ref_user_akses WHERE ref_user_akses_user_id = 1) and lower(ref_modul_akses_label) = '#referensi'

SELECT ref_modul_akses_label FROM ref_modul_akses WHERE ref_modul_akses_group_id IN ( SELECT ref_user_akses_group_id FROM ref_user_akses WHERE ref_user_akses_user_id = 1) and lower(ref_modul_akses_label) = '#akses'
